name: FastCGI DevKit
notes:
Per Fedora, this license is based on MIT, but contains additional clauses
which make it more than a simple MIT variant, notably, the requirement of
statement of new terms of contributions under a different license. For that
reason, this license is Free, but GPL-incompatible.
text:
